methods.name: public T setVendorId(int vendorId)
methods.comment: * Sets the vendor id of the device, identifying the company who manufactured the device.

methods.name: public T setProductId(int productId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the product id of the device, uniquely identifying the device within the address
         * space of a given vendor, identified by the device's vendor id.

methods.name: public T setAssociatedDisplayId(int displayId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the associated display ID of the virtual input device. Required. * *

The input device is restricted to the display with the given ID and may not send * events to any other display.

methods.name: public T setInputDeviceName(@NonNull String deviceName)
methods.comment:
* Sets the name of the virtual input device. Required. * *

The name must be unique among all input devices that belong to the same virtual * device.

* *

The maximum allowed length of the name is 80 bytes in UTF-8 encoding, enforced by * {@code UINPUT_MAX_NAME_SIZE}.

methods.name: T self()
methods.comment: * Each subclass should return itself to allow the builder to chain properly
